member.name: D2D1_EFFECT_INPUT_DESCRIPTION.effect
member.summary: The effect whose input connection is being specified.

member.name: D2D1_EFFECT_INPUT_DESCRIPTION.inputIndex
member.summary: The input index of the effect that is being considered.

member.name: D2D1_EFFECT_INPUT_DESCRIPTION.inputRectangle
member.summary: The amount of data that would be available on the input. This can be used to query this information when the data is not yet available.
